testsuite.name: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: When I choose creating new question/Text from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: And Question Designer is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: When I enter valid information for the question name as "An adaptive question"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: And I click inside the question text editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: And I click Response Area button to open the dialog and assert that the Choose Question Type page is visible
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: When I choose "Mathematical Formula" link from the dialog and complete the correct answer
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: And I click OK
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: Then I see the "Mathematical Formula" Question Widget in the question text section
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: When I click Insert/Edit Adaptive Section and then the OK button in the Edit Adaptive Section popup
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: Then I see "1" Adaptive section bars in the question text section
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: When I click Response Area button to open the dialog and assert that the Choose Question Type page is visible
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: And I choose "Numeric" link from the dialog and complete the correct answer
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: And I click OK
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: Then I see the "Numeric with Units" Question Widget in the question text section
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: When I click Insert/Edit Adaptive Section and then the OK button in the Edit Adaptive Section popup
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: Then I see "2" Adaptive section bars in the question text section
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: And I enter in the Algorithm Editor "$a=rint(1,10);"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: When I click the Preview button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: Then I assert that the Mathematical Formula question is rendered properly on the Question Preview page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: When I click the "Verify" button of adaptive question
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: Then I assert that the Numeric question is rendered properly on the Question Preview page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: Then I close the question preview window
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: And I click the question designer Save & Close button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: When I choose creating new lesson in "Student Readiness" unit from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: Then Lesson Editor is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: When I enter valid information for the lesson "A lesson for test"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: And I click the import question button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: Then The import questions dialog appears
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: When I click on "Questions"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: And I select the question "An adaptive question"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: And I click Import Questions in the Import Questions dialog
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: Then verify the question caption text is "An adaptive question"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: When I save & close the lesson on the design page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: Then I see summary of the lesson
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: When I save and close the lesson summary details
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: Then the new lesson "A lesson for test" is visible in its own expanded column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: And it is named as "A lesson for test" in "Student Readiness" column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: When I navigate to the System Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: And I am on "Class Homepage" page of "Demonstration Class" class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: And I click on the "A lesson for test" module in the "Student Readiness" unit
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: Then the module "A lesson for test" is opened without launch page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: Then I assert that the Mathematical Formula question is rendered properly
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: And I see the "Try Another" question button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: And I see the "Start Over" question button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: When I click the "Verify" button of adaptive question
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: Then I assert that the Numeric question is rendered properly
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: When I click the "Try Another" question button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: Then I assert that the Mathematical Formula question is rendered properly
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: And I see the "Try Another" question button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: And I see the "Start Over" question button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: When I click the "Start Over" question button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: Then I assert that the Mathematical Formula question is rendered properly
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: And I see the "Try Another" question button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: And I see the "Start Over" question button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: Then I save and quit the lesson
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: And I am on the Class Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with an algorithmic adaptive question, and the question buttons work well
